languages.text: {n}Дворянин окидывает мстителя испуганным взглядом.{/n} "Все очень просто, Ваша Светлость. Его младший братец много смыслит в одежде. Я заметил это, когда искал слуг, и отправил парня учиться у хорошего модиста в верхних кварталах — хотел взять его себе в камердинеры. Но этот кретин решил, что родственника забрали не из-за таланта, а ради омоложения. Да на кой черт мне новое лицо — я еще свое не сносил!"

{n}The nobleman eyes his attacker fearfully.{/n} "It's very simple, Your Celestial Highness. His younger brother has a way with clothes. I noticed him when I was looking for new servants, and I sent the boy to apprentice under a renowned dressmaker in the upper quarters. I thought I would make him my valet, you see. But then, this fool decided that I took his brother, not because of his talent, but to use him for my rejuvenation. Why would I even need a new face? I haven't even worn out my own yet!"
languages.original_text: {n}Дворянин окидывает мстителя испуганным взглядом.{/n} "Все очень просто, Ваша Светлость. Его младший братец много смыслит в одежде. Я заметил это, когда искал слуг, и отправил парня учиться у хорошего модиста в верхних кварталах — хотел взять его себе в камердинеры. Но этот кретин решил, что родственника забрали не из-за таланта, а ради омоложения. Да на кой черт мне новое лицо — я еще свое не сносил!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The nobleman eyes his attacker fearfully.{/n} "It's very simple, Your Celestial Highness. His younger brother has a way with clothes. I noticed him when I was looking for new servants, and I sent the boy to apprentice under a renowned dressmaker in the upper quarters — I thought I would make him my valet, you see. But this fool decided that I did not take his brother because of his talent, but to use him for my rejuvenation. Why would I even need a new face? I haven't worn out my own just yet!"

{n}The nobleman eyes his attacker fearfully.{/n} "It's very simple, Your Celestial Highness. His younger brother has a way with clothes. I noticed him when I was looking for new servants, and I sent the boy to apprentice under a renowned dressmaker in the upper quarters. I thought I would make him my valet, you see. But then, this fool decided that I took his brother, not because of his talent, but to use him for my rejuvenation. Why would I even need a new face? I haven't even worn out my own yet!"

{n}The nobleman tosses his attacker a scornful look.{/n} "It's very simple, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. His younger brother has a way with clothes. He asked me to take him to the upper quarters to help him get away from his deranged older brother. But this fool decided that I did not take his brother to employ him, but to use him for my rejuvenation. Ridiculous! If you could see his brother's face, you would understand — no one in their right mind would stitch it to themselves!"

languages.text: {n}贵族惊恐地看着袭击者。{/n}“事情很简单，来自上界的大人。他弟弟是位出色的裁缝，我在物色新仆人的时候注意到了他弟弟，于是我把那孩子送到了上城区，让他跟着有名的裁缝当学徒。如您所见，我打算让他弟弟当我的贴身男仆，可这个蠢货却以为我看中的并不是他弟弟的手艺，以为我把他弟弟的脸缝到了我自己脸上。可我干嘛要给自己弄张新脸啊？我自己的脸明明还好好的呢！”
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman eyes his attacker fearfully.{/n} "It's very simple, Your Celestial Highness. His younger brother has a way with clothes. I noticed him when I was looking for new servants, and I sent the boy to apprentice under a renowned dressmaker in the upper quarters. I thought I would make him my valet, you see. But then, this fool decided that I took his brother, not because of his talent, but to use him for my rejuvenation. Why would I even need a new face? I haven't even worn out my own yet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}贵族惊恐地看着袭击者。{/n}“事情很简单，来自上界的大人。他弟弟是位出色的裁缝，我在物色新仆人的时候注意到了他弟弟，于是我把那孩子送到了上城区，让他跟着有名的裁缝当学徒。如您所见，我打算让他弟弟当我的贴身男仆，可这个蠢货却以为我看中的并不是他弟弟的手艺，以为我把他弟弟的脸缝到了我自己脸上。可我干嘛要给自己弄张新脸啊？我自己的脸明明还好好的呢！”

languages.text:
{n}その貴族は襲撃者を恐る恐る見つめた。{/n}「とても単純なことなのです、天の閣下。あの男の弟には、服飾の才能がありましてね。私は新しい使用人を探していたときに彼に目をつけ、上層区の名高い仕立て屋のもとで弟を弟子入りさせました。いずれ私の従者にしようと思いまして。ところがこの馬鹿者は、私が弟の才能を見込んだのではなく、自分の若返りのために弟を奪ったのだと思い込んだのです。
私がなぜ新しい顔など必要とするのでしょう？まだ自分の顔さえ使い古していないというのに！」
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman eyes his attacker fearfully.{/n} "It's very simple, Your Celestial Highness. His younger brother has a way with clothes. I noticed him when I was looking for new servants, and I sent the boy to apprentice under a renowned dressmaker in the upper quarters. I thought I would make him my valet, you see. But then, this fool decided that I took his brother, not because of his talent, but to use him for my rejuvenation. Why would I even need a new face? I haven't even worn out my own yet!"

traits.locale_text:
{n}その貴族は襲撃者を恐る恐る見つめた。{/n}「とても単純なことなのです、天の閣下。あの男の弟には、服飾の才能がありましてね。私は新しい使用人を探していたときに彼に目をつけ、上層区の名高い仕立て屋のもとで弟を弟子入りさせました。いずれ私の従者にしようと思いまして。ところがこの馬鹿者は、私が弟の才能を見込んだのではなく、自分の若返りのために弟を奪ったのだと思い込んだのです。
私がなぜ新しい顔など必要とするのでしょう？まだ自分の顔さえ使い古していないというのに！」

languages.text: {n}El noble mira atemorizado a su atacante.{/n} «Es muy sencillo, Excelencia Celestial. Su hermano menor tiene mucho talento para la ropa. Me fijé en él cuando buscaba nuevos sirvientes y envié al muchacho a que fuera aprendiz de un afamado sastre de los barrios superiores. Pensaba nombrarlo mi ayudante de cámara. Pero de pronto este insensato decidió que me había llevado a su hermano, no por su talento sino para usarlo en mi rejuvenecimiento. ¿Para qué iba a querer una cara nueva? ¡Todavía tengo la mía propia!».
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman eyes his attacker fearfully.{/n} "It's very simple, Your Celestial Highness. His younger brother has a way with clothes. I noticed him when I was looking for new servants, and I sent the boy to apprentice under a renowned dressmaker in the upper quarters. I thought I would make him my valet, you see. But then, this fool decided that I took his brother, not because of his talent, but to use him for my rejuvenation. Why would I even need a new face? I haven't even worn out my own yet!"

Me fijé en él cuando buscaba nuevos sirvientes y envié al muchacho a que fuera aprendiz de un afamado sastre de los barrios superiores. Pensaba nombrarlo mi ayudante de cámara. Pero de pronto este insensato decidió que me había llevado a su hermano, no por su talento sino para usarlo en mi rejuvenecimiento. ¿Para qué iba a querer una cara nueva? ¡Todavía tengo la mía propia!».

languages.text: {n}Soylu, saldırgana korkuyla bakıyor.{/n} "Her şey ortada Semavi Efendimiz. Kardeşi giyim kuşamdan iyi anlar. Yeni hizmetkârlar ararken fark edip çocuğu üst katlardaki ünlü bir terzinin yanına çırak verdim. Uşağım yapmayı düşünüyordum. Sonra bu aptal, kardeşini becerilerinden ötürü değil de gençleşmek istediğimden aldığımı sandı. Neden yeni bir yüze ihtiyacım olsun ki? Kendi yüzüm daha yıpranmaya başlamadı bile!"
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman eyes his attacker fearfully.{/n} "It's very simple, Your Celestial Highness. His younger brother has a way with clothes. I noticed him when I was looking for new servants, and I sent the boy to apprentice under a renowned dressmaker in the upper quarters. I thought I would make him my valet, you see. But then, this fool decided that I took his brother, not because of his talent, but to use him for my rejuvenation. Why would I even need a new face? I haven't even worn out my own yet!"

languages.text: {n}Le noble observe son assaillant avec effroi.{/n} « C'est très simple, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Son jeune frère a un vrai don pour le stylisme. Il a retenu mon attention alors que j'étais à la recherche de nouveaux serviteurs. Je l'ai envoyé en apprentissage chez un tailleur renommé des hauts quartiers. J'espérais en faire mon valet, voyez-vous. Mais cet imbécile s'est mis en tête que je ne voulais pas employer son talentueux cadet, mais l'utiliser pour mon rajeunissement. Pourquoi aurais-je besoin d'un nouveau visage ? Celui que je porte actuellement est encore en excellent état ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman eyes his attacker fearfully.{/n} "It's very simple, Your Celestial Highness. His younger brother has a way with clothes. I noticed him when I was looking for new servants, and I sent the boy to apprentice under a renowned dressmaker in the upper quarters. I thought I would make him my valet, you see. But then, this fool decided that I took his brother, not because of his talent, but to use him for my rejuvenation. Why would I even need a new face? I haven't even worn out my own yet!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le noble observe son assaillant avec effroi.{/n} « C'est très simple, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Son jeune frère a un vrai don pour le stylisme. Il a retenu mon attention alors que j'étais à la recherche de nouveaux serviteurs. Je l'ai envoyé en apprentissage chez un tailleur renommé des hauts quartiers. J'espérais en faire mon valet, voyez-vous. Mais cet imbécile s'est mis en tête que je ne voulais pas employer son talentueux cadet, mais l'utiliser pour mon rajeunissement. Pourquoi aurais-je besoin d'un nouveau visage ? Celui que je porte actuellement est encore en excellent état ! »

languages.text: {n}Der Adelige beäugt seinen Angreifer ängstlich.{/n} "Es ist ganz einfach, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Sein jüngerer Bruder weiß mit Stoffen umzugehen. Er fiel mir auf, als ich nach neuen Dienern suchte, also schickte ich den Knaben zu einem namhaften Schneider in den oberen Vierteln in die Lehre. Ich wollte ihn zu meinem Kammerdiener machen. Aber dann kam dieser Idiot auf die Idee, ich hätte seinen Bruder nicht wegen seines Talents zu mir geholt, sondern für meine persönliche Verjüngung. Wozu sollte ich ein neues Gesicht brauchen? Ich habe mein altes doch noch gar nicht aufgetragen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The nobleman eyes his attacker fearfully.{/n} "It's very simple, Your Celestial Highness. His younger brother has a way with clothes. I noticed him when I was looking for new servants, and I sent the boy to apprentice under a renowned dressmaker in the upper quarters. I thought I would make him my valet, you see. But then, this fool decided that I took his brother, not because of his talent, but to use him for my rejuvenation. Why would I even need a new face? I haven't even worn out my own yet!"

Ich habe mein altes doch noch gar nicht aufgetragen!"
